All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppGraphics
This interface represents the graphics functionalities of the application.
AppServer
This is the interface of a service-provider server to which a client can connect and disconnect
AspectRatioLayout
This class implements LayoutManager allowing to display a single Component with a fixed width/height ratio
ChatPanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that shows the chat
Client
This class is the entry point of the client
ClientEndPoint
This class is an implementation of ClientInterface and represents the client endpoint for socket and RMI connections
ClientInterface
This interface is a collection of interfaces and contains all the methods a server can call on client
ClientSocketHandler
This class manages a socket connection on client side
ColumnChooserButton
This class extends JButton and represents a graphical component that allows the user to choose a shelf column
CommonGoal
This class is the abstract class for the goals,
CommonGoal.Event
This enumeration contains all the goal events that can be sent to observers
CommonGoalGraphics
This interface represents the graphics for a common goal.
CommonGoalInfo
This record contains information about the state of a CommonGoal
CommonGoalsPanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that displays the common goals
CommonGoalTest
This class tests the common goal
CommonGoalView
This is the view interface of a CommonGoal
CreateGamePanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that allows to create a new game inserting a GameId and a PlayerId
Game
This is the abstract class for games.
Game.Event
This enumeration contains all the game events that can be sent to observers
Game.GameStatus
This enumeration represents all the statuses of the game
GameAccessDeniedException
This class represents an error occurred when trying to join a Game
GameAlreadyExistsException
This class represents an error occurred when trying to create a duplicated Game
GameBuilder
This class contains the methods for creating a new game based on its type and initializing the various game components.
GameBuilderTest
This class tests the game builder
GameController
This is the interface of a game controller
GameEndedException
This class represents an error occurred when trying to perform an action on a Game that has ended
GameGraphics
This interface represents the graphics functionalities of the game
GameInfo
This record contains information about the status of a Game
GameInfoGraphics
This interface represents the graphics for the current match.
GameManagerController
This is the interface of a game manager controller
GameNotExistsException
This class represents an error occurred when trying to retrieve a Game that does not exist
GamePanel
This class extends JComponent manage game play graphics
GameView
This is the view interface of a Game
GoalEvaluator
This class is the abstract class for the goal evaluators.
GoalsEvaluatorsTest
This class tests the goal evaluators
GUI
This class extends JFrame and represents the main frame of the GUI
HomePanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that allows to create or join a game
JoinGamePanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that allows to join a game inserting a GameId and a PlayerId
LivingRoom
This is the abstract class of game living room.
LivingRoom.Event
This enumeration contains all the living room events that can be sent to observers
LivingRoomGraphics
This interface represents the graphics for living room board It provides a method to update the information of the board when the users are playing the game.
LivingRoomInfo
This record contains information about the state of a LivingRoom
LivingRoomPanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that shows the living room board
LivingRoomView
This is the view interface of a LivingRoom
LobbyController
This is the interface of a game lobby controller
LoginInfo
This record contains information about a Login request
MatchmakingClosedException
This class represents an error occurred when trying to join a Game that has already started
Message
This interface defines the methods to access to message data
NetworkChoicePanel
This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that allows to choose the type of connection to use
NewGameInfo
This record contains information of a Game creation request
Observable<Event extends Enum<Event>>
This class represents an observable object, or "data" in the model-view paradigm.
ObservableTest
This class tests the Observable class
Observer<SubjectType extends Observable<Event>,Event extends Enum<Event>>
A class can implement the Observer interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.
Parser
This class contains the cli arguments parser

This record contains information about the state of a Player
PlayerInfoGraphics

PlayerMoveInfo

PlayerNotExistsException

This enumeration contains all the possible tiles that can appear in the game

This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component whose purpose is to allow the user to choose the order of the tiles
TimedLock<ValueType>
This class implements a thread-lock that can be interrupted setting a value to be stored, the lock can be indefinite or have a timeout, in this case a default value is set and stored after the timeout
TimedLockTest
This class tests the TimedLock class
Token
This enumerable contains all the possible tokens of the game

This class tests the Token class

This class is the Text User Interface of the game.

Class that represents a pair of string and colour

Enum that represents the scenes of the game

This class contains utility methods for the TUI

This class represent a user of the server

This enumeration contains all the events that can be sent to observers

This enumeration contains all the statuses a user can be
UserInfo
This record contains information about the state of a User on the server

This class tests the User class
UserView
This is the view interface of a User
ViewCollection
This is a collection of interfaces that contains all the necessary methods to update the application view
ViewLogic
This class manages the view of the application and the communication with the server.

This class extends JPanel and represents a graphical component that shows the leaderboard at the end of the game
